definition: to do harm to/to cause trouble to/harm/evil/calamity
mouth/classifier for things with mouths (people, domestic animals, cannons, wells etc)/classifier for bites or mouthfuls
to jeopardize/to harm/to endanger/harmful effect/damage/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: What makes the candle blow so?
Oh, you are the jerk who disturbed my sleep last night.
sentences.chinese: 就是昨天晚上拍桌子打椅子害我们睡不着的那个混蛋。

sentences.english: Iam so sorry I killed her.
Pull a sled into the mud, so we worse calamity.
sentences.chinese: 把雪橇拖进泥塘里，害得我们糟了殃。

sentences.english: I know deep feeling is hurt, but still stubborn have not changed.
sentences.chinese: 我明知深情是害，可还固执的死性不改。

sentences.english: Taoyuan Coal Mine is the threatened mine by manifold groundwater.
sentences.chinese: 桃园煤矿是一个受多种地下水害威胁的矿井。

sentences.english: The Heat did nothing of the sort, and it hurt them.
sentences.chinese: 热火队什么也没做，最终害了自己。

sentences.english: In the same way the Son of Man is going to suffer at their hands.
sentences.chinese: 人子也将要这样受他们的害。

sentences.english: Lord, " he said, "my servant lies at home paralyzed and in terrible suffering."
sentences.chinese: 主阿，我的仆人害瘫痪病，躺在家里，甚是疼苦。

sentences.english: Spare the rod and spoiled the child.
Safety regulations written in blood, and the violation of affliction.
sentences.chinese: 安全法规血写成，违章害己害亲人。

sentences.english: Others blamed the careful doe for leading him to the slaughter.
sentences.chinese: 还有些树仙责怪那只母鹿害他惨遭屠杀。

sentences.english: But, where do lovelorn young couples elope?
sentences.chinese: 但是，害了相思病的年轻情侣们都私奔何方呢？

sentences.english: The colonel had been attacked by brain fever three days previously.
sentences.chinese: 上校害了三天的大脑炎。

sentences.english: Doctors gave a warning that she could die by simply brushing her hair.
sentences.chinese: 她被医师警告称，梳头发也可能害她“死掉”。

sentences.english: I hate it when people take their sweet time and don't get out of the way!
sentences.chinese: 有人走路慢挡住我搭电梯下去的路，害我没搭上地铁。

to harm sb/to inflict suffering/to victimize/pernicious
